Package graph

Interface WeightedGraph<T,N extends Node<T>,E extends WeightedEdge<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the nodes.
N - The node specification.
E - The edge specification.
All Superinterfaces:
Graph<T,N,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
WeightedGraphClass
public interface WeightedGraph<T,N extends Node<T>,E extends WeightedEdge<T>> extends Graph<T,N,E>
Represents a graph with weighted edges.

    • getTotalWeight

      int getTotalWeight()
      Gets the total weight presented in the graph.
      Returns:
      The sum of the weight of all the edges.
